title: NSL Service Disruption Due to Signaling Fault

title_translations.ms: Gangguan Perkhidmatan NSL Akibat Kerosakan Isyarat
title_translations.ta: சிக்னலிங் கோளாறு காரணமாக NSL சேவை இடையூறு

updates.text: [NSL] CLEARED: Train service on the North-South Line has returned to normalcy.
[NSL]UPDATE: : Due to a signalling fault, pls add 15mins train travel time between #AngMoKio and #ChoaChuKang. Train service is still available, we apologise for the delay to your journey.
[NSL]UPDATE: : Due to a signalling fault, pls add 15mins train travel time between #AngMoKio and #ChoaChuKang. Train service is still available. Commuters are advised to use alternative lines.
